data.name: Monthly Term Deposit 19-24 months
data.description: Fixed term deposits offer a guaranteed rate of return on your money for the life of an investment. Choose the term or interest rate that best suits you.

features.additionalInfo: If you want to withdraw your TD prior to maturity, you are required to provide 31 days' prior notice. You may incur a repayment adjustment.
You can self-serve your day-to-day banking needs via Bank Australia's App, Internet Banking or Phone Banking.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Customers must be aged 13+ to open a personal Term Deposit. Customers must be aged 18+ to open a non-personal Term Deposit. This term deposit cannot be opened through digital channels.

eligibility.additionalValue: Natural Person or In trust for a Natural Person or Non-Individual entity
Be an Australian citizen, permanent resident or have a valid visa; or entity be registered in Australia

depositRates.additionalInfo: Interest rates expressed as annual percentage rates.
